Dates of inspection: JUL 03 SEP 21 JUL 12 SEP 22 SEP 15 NOV 05 SEP 18 NOV 25
(A) Evidence of Erosion: Massive gravel building up at lower end.
(B) Particulars of Scouring: New flood channel cut through timber immediately above massive gravel. New channel will take majority of summer flow.
(D) Spawning distribution: Lower half of Gordon River utilized for all salmon species. Steelhead spawn in upper reaches.
(G) New obstructions: Gravel bar at lower end is getting larger each year. Remove gravel.
(K) Additional comments: Extensive logging in upper reaches, resulting in gravel bar at lower end. Poor salmon returns. Sooke contractor, increasing Larry Childs, removed log and debris jam at bottom end. Counted
